tweets.body:
Neil Druckmann on a potential The Last of Us Part 3:
"The Last of Us is obviously a world I love deeply and know our studio and fans do as well, but I have no comment at this moment on the series’ future beyond our focus on The Last of Us Part II Remastered, we have other projects in the works at Naughty Dog."

"Bill Clinton":
Por su reunión con Javier Milei

Who controls the memes, controls the universe.

If we don’t make more memes, the people we hate will.
More people are playing Red Dead Redemption 2 on Steam now than ever before.
